co.uk.niadel.mpi.events.client

Class EventDisplayModGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.events.client.EventDisplayModGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent

    public class EventDisplayModGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEvent
    Fired when a GUI from a mod is displayed. I may make this cancellable, however, I'm not sure if malicious modders will use this to enforce their vendetta against other mods.
    Author:
    Niadel
